name: Rocket Blast
description:
Rocket Blast is an single-player arcade themed high-score game. Where your goal is to prevent rockets, launched from earth, from getting out of the atmosphere. Gaining score along the way for keeping them in and destroying them.

Spend your score to buy upgrades from the shop in hopes of attaining a new high score, but be wary the difficulty increases the longer you go.

Controls:

  • Left & right mouse buttons, Left & Right arrow or A & D - Move
  • Esc, space or p - Pause
